WeLoveServers KVM VPS hosting allows you to run just about any x86 based operating system as a virtual machine for significantly less than a dedicated server. We provide a wide range of OS ready to be installed at the checkout process including CentOS, Fedora Core, Ubuntu, Debian and many more. Our servers utilize Dual HexaCore Intel Xeon E5 processors with hardware RAID10 for blistering performance and reliability.

Our support team respond to tickets on average in under 10 minutes and live chat requests even faster 24/7/365!

Specifications of our VPS's:
  • Hosted on Dual Intel Xeon Hexa-Core E5 processors with hardware RAID10 to ensure redundancy and high performance. All backed with robust infrastructure and a premium multi-homed network.
  • KVM Virtualization
  • Instant VPS Setup (i.e. start using your VPS right away!)
  • 99.9% Uptime
  • Full Root Access (full control over your VPS!)
  • Additional IPv4 Addresses Available
  • Choice of Linux OS: CentOS, Debian, Ubuntu, more upon request.
  • Access to VPS CP to manage your VPS (ex: starting, stopping, rebooting server without needing to email support)
